section.offPlanTitle: New Off-Plan Properties for Sale in Dubai
section.offPlanDesc: Off-plan properties are developments which are still in planning or construction. Buying in the UAE provides early-phase pricing and flexible payment plans.

footer.join: Join over 9500 members and get updates of new off-plan launches & latest real estate news

offPlan.heading: New Off-Plan Properties in Dubai
offPlan.description: Off-plan properties are those developments which are still in the planning or construction stages. Purchasing an off-plan property in Dubai (the UAE) comes with certain advantages as many real estate developers in the UAE offer special promotions in the early phases, such as generous post-handover payment plans.
offPlan.cta: Find Your Off-Plan Property in Dubai
